name: Aftershocks
description:
Play Demanim, who masquerades as a human after he is deposed from his rule over one of the largest (literal) demon empires! Guide him on his first steps back as he recovers from his wounds and finds that something is about his all-but-mortal wound is causing him to weaken with time.

You will need to make tradeoffs between exercising your abilities now (to get treasure, save lives, kill things, or just to show off) and saving as much power as you can for the final showdown when you return to your capital!
